name: tm13
effect: Teaches Ice Beam to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Ice Beam to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Snore)

flavor_text.black_white: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.
